title: Pomegranate
description: Watch and learn how to cut pomegranate using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery.

asset.title: Pomegranate
asset.description: Watch and learn how to cut pomegranate using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery. For more videos, visit www.knifeskills.com
asset.author: Calphalon

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Okay today we have this beautiful pomegranate. I'm going to be using the three and a half inch pairing knife. What we're going to be doing is going around the crown of the pomegranate and it is essential to have a sharp knife as you're doing this. These knives are fantastic with the self sharpening block. Okay, now that we have the top removed, we're going to cut down into segments. So as you're doing this, firmly hold the knife, get int there, and use you're left hand to turn the fruit. Now that we have our segments, we're just going to pull it back nice and gently. Alright quick and easy. We have our pomegranate ready to be seeded and perfect for salads.
